articles.description: Aamir Khan and Kiran Rao are all set to celebrate their 15th wedding anniversary on December 28, 2020. Ahead of it, the couple headed out of Mumbai with kids Azad, Ira Khan and nephew Imran Khan and his daughter and were snapped at the airport.

articles.author: Sagarika Choudhary
articles.title: Neha Kakkar reveals Rohanpreet Singh was drunk when he proposed to her - Mumbai Mirror
articles.description: Bollywood singer Neha Kakkar, who recently tied the knot with Rohanpreet Singh amid much fanfare, revealed that the latter was actually drunk when he had proposed to her for marriage.

articles.title: Pankaj Tripathi on Kaagaz: ‘No one would have thought that a plain-looking guy like me could be lead... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Actor Pankaj Tripathi, who arrived in Mumbai in 2004 to pursue his passion as an actor, says he would never have expected back then to be a lead actor in any film. He will soon be seen as the lead in Kaagaz.
